name: Guard the Grammar
description:
Guard the Grammar is an educational game with tower defense elements.

Correct the sentence punctuation with the right punctuation marks. 

Click the tool from the marking toolbar to select it and click on the spawned sentences that needs correcting.

Make sure you use the right punctation. If you use the wrong mark for the sentence, the sentence will move faster and the tool panel will freeze for a random amount of seconds.

 Don't let the sentence reach the X, it will remove you health!

made for text-only jam 2
